overview: Embark upon this amazing journey through the life of America’s beloved heroines, Rosa Parks,  as her family introduces a side of Parks few people knew. Her cousin, personal caretaker and  assistant, Carolyn Williamson Green, along with Parks’ researcher, Dr. Jeanne Theoharis, gives  us a glimpse behind the stoic icon who was indeed a rebel against discrimination not only in the  South, but also in the North. Follow Green’s passion as she keeps her cousin’s memory alive  through a lifetime of public service in the city of Detroit.
tagline: An Exploration of Carolyn Williamson Green's Quest to Protect the Public Service Legacy of Rosa Parks
title: My Life with Rosie
